languages.text: Оправдал{mf||а} Хейнриксу уничтожение еретического когитатора преданностью Империуму.
Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator because of your devotion to the Imperium.
languages.original_text: Оправдал{mf||а} Хейнриксу уничтожение еретического когитатора преданностью Империуму.

traits.locale_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator because of your devotion to the Imperium.
Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator because of your devotion to the Imperium.
Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator because of your devotion to the Imperium.
Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator because of your devotion to the Imperium.
Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator because of your devotion to the Imperium.

languages.text: 你告诉海因里希，说你出于对帝国的忠诚，摧毁了那台异端沉思者。
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator because of your devotion to the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 你告诉海因里希，说你出于对帝国的忠诚，摧毁了那台异端思考器。

languages.text: Heinrix gesagt, dass du den ketzerischen Cogitator aus Hingabe zum Imperium zerstört hast.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator because of your devotion to the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix gesagt, dass du den ketzerischen Cogitator aus Hingabe zum Imperium zerstört hast.

languages.text: Vous avez dit à Heinrix que vous avez détruit le cogitateur hérétique par dévotion envers l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator because of your devotion to the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez dit à Heinrix que vous avez détruit le cogitateur hérétique par dévotion envers l'Imperium.

languages.text: Le has dicho a Heinrix que has destruido el cogitador hereje por devoción al Imperium.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator because of your devotion to the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Le has dicho a Heinrix que has destruido el cogitador hereje por devoción al Imperium.

languages.text: ハインリックスに、帝国への献身ゆえに異端の考算機を滅ぼしたと言った。
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator because of your devotion to the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: ハインリックスに、帝国への献身ゆえに異端の考算機を滅ぼしたと言った。

languages.text: Heinrix'e, İmparatorluk'a olan bağlılığından ötürü kâfir kavramsayarı imha ettiğini söyledin.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator because of your devotion to the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix'e, İmparatorluk'a olan bağlılığından ötürü kâfir kavramsayarı imha ettiğini söyledin.
